articles.title: COVID-19 treatments: What's FDA authorized, and what works - American Medical Association
articles.description: More patients are turning up COVID-19 positive, thanks to the Omicron variant. Learn which outpatient therapies you can turn to for those at highest risk of severe outcomes.
articles.content: Whats the news: New cases of COVID-19 infections are surging in the U.S. and are at the highest levels of the pandemic. The fast-spreading variant, B.1.1.529, more widely known as Omicron, is fueling… [+4789 chars]
